alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Holey Land Wildlife Refuge to Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal to 9 miles south of Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Weston, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal and West Broward Rec. Area On Alligator Alley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
